attributes.action: Gender equality by statute for the U.K parliament
attributes.additional_details:
Gender equality by statute for the U.K parliament
For the national parliament as the instrument of our language, to be truly democratic and to represent the universality then it should reflect the experience of all of us. What is the objective of all women short lists ultimately if not to achieve this and when?

This petition proposes to;

Provide gender equality in government by pairing each seat and prevent funding of political parties from sources other than the treasury.

The aim is to elevate parliament to the position of primacy and to end political apathy in the U.K and provide the institution of complete credibility for generations to come.
